entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
